document_data.mainbody:
hree Thayvian Roses was a rowdy, loud, and explicitly indecorous festhall song, written and popularized sometime before 1368 DR.
In 1368 DR, Three Thayvian Roses was performed by god Milil, the Lord of All Songs. He imposed the beautiful song on an audience of Sensates from Sigil who were performing a scrying ritual to experience the forbidden experience of spying on Torillian deities. The songs bawdy lyrics brought blush to Erin Darkflame Montgomerys face, the stern factol of the Society of Sensation.
